t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.
Enroll your brand in Amazon Brand Registry to become eligible to activate a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.

s: June 4, 2024 - This program can help connect you with IP legal service providers that offer trademark-registration services at competitive rates. Brands who use IP Accelerator also get faster access to Brand Registry benefits, which they can enjoy while their trademark application is pending.

16 hours ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

November 26, 2024 - Amazon Basics (formerly written as AmazonBasics) is a private label that offers home goods, office supplies, and tech accessories. The line was launched in 2009.
